title: windows 10 auto update NEED HELP PLEASE!
body:
so i haven't had any lag at all in any game forever. all of a sudden ever since the first windows 10 auto update that was about a month ago or whatever i constantly have very slight lag spikes. it looks like its ms issue i go from about 70 to 180 then back. it ruins late hits and lots of fights do to walking forward when i clicked back. If ANYONE could help me it would be super appreciated. 

note: its also happening in cs:go. but not wow or H1Z1. and i did have to change something with a static ip previously but cant find the video to change it again.

replies.body:
Spikes or changes in latency can be caused by a number of different factors. I'd first recommend working through our [connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to ensure your local settings are compatible with League.

Let me know if those steps caused any change.
